other_tests.findings: Basal and GnRH-stimulated LH and FSH levels compatible with a prepubertal pattern.
other_tests.changes_over_time: A second GnRH stimulation test was again compatible with a prepubertal pattern of LH response.

other_tests.findings: Serum basal cortisol and aldosterone levels were very low and did not rise after ACTH stimulation.
A G insertion between nucleotides 430 and 431 in exon 1 causing a novel frameshift mutation and a premature stop codon at position 71.
Clear decrease in testicular size and T levels reached normal prepubertal levels.
other_tests.changes_over_time: His T levels remained within the prepubertal range.
